title-group.article-title: A Finite Element Method for the Stationary Stokes Equations Using Trial Functions which do not have to Satisfy div u= 0

abstract.p: By adding a term to the variational equations, we derive a new finite element method for the stationary Stokes equations which eliminates the div u= 0 restriction on the trial functions. The method is described using continuous piecewise linear functions, and the optimal $O(h)$ order of convergence estimate is derived for the error in the $H^1(\Omega)$ norm.
